content: Hey @Joshua Nelson , what’s your opinion about what to do about those CFG variables you noted? Should we rename them (e.g. to RUSTC_CFG or RUST_CFG), or should I just print out all the CFG variables along with the RUST and CARGO prefixed ones?
Changing them to RUSTC_CFG seems reasonable if you're up for changing them :) we should give a heads up to @Caleb Cartwright and any other tools setting them during the build though
I don't recall quite what they're used for, but I imagine it may break things if they're not set in subtle ways (e.g., version number disappearing)

Okay. It seemed to work for me, and I didn't include any of the CFG nor CARGO variables in my invocation.

ooh that's really good news :) that means we can merge #82403 without having to mess with the variables
yeah I think I’d like to take that step first, and do this other thing as a follow-up item.
